>> % problem 2
>> syms N_e
>> N_h = 3e24;
>> me_star = 0.067*me; mh_star = 0.47*me; Eg = 1.42;
>> T = 300;
>> solve(N_e*N_h == ((2*pi*kb_Joules*T)/(h_Joules^2))^3  *  (me_star*mh_star)^(3/2)  *  exp(-Eg/(kb_eV*T)))
 
ans =
 
4561772427654061/11175870895385742
 
>> double(ans)

ans =

    0.4082

>> ((2*pi*kb_Joules*T)/(h_Joules^2))^3  *  (me_star*mh_star)^(3/2)  *  exp(-Eg/(kb_eV*T))

   1.2245e+24

>> N_v = 2((2*pi*0.47*me*kb_Joules*300)/(h_Joules^2))^(3/2)
